mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `eomisae_system`.`banned_ips`(created_at, expires_at, expired_flag, ip) VALUES (#{createdAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{isExpired}, #{ip})
INSERT INTO `eomisae_system`.`exception_logs`(created_at, message, stacktrace) VALUES (#{createdAt}, SUBSTRING(#{message}, 1, 1000), SUBSTRING(#{stacktrace}, 1, 10000))
mapper.select: select `index` AS `index`, `user_index` AS `userIndex`, `created_at` AS `createdAt`, `client_ip` AS `clientIp`, `client_ua` AS `clientUa`, `request_uri` AS `requestUri`, `result` AS `result` FROM `eomisae_system`.`activity_logs` WHERE `user_index` = #{userIndex} GROUP BY `index` ORDER BY `index` DESC LIMIT #{count} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `eomisae_system`.`activity_logs` WHERE `client_ip` = #{ip} AND `result` IN ('FAILURE', 'ILLEGAL') AND `created_at` > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{lookBackSeconds} SECOND)
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `eomisae_system`.`banned_ips` WHERE `ip` = #{ip} AND `expires_at` > NOW() AND `expired_flag` = FALSE
